title: Text-Based Programming Learning Design Utilizing Pioneer Narratives

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening pre-service teachers' capacity to develop mathematics-integrated programming projects

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more programming problem-solving strategies through pioneers' real-world cases
Learners can independently develop a mathematics problem-solving program using Python in a VR simulation environment
Learners achieve over 80% in project functionality (40%) and creativity (30%) based on peer assessment criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
